column5: Anyone know the price of beer in Canada? And does anyone know how much duty tax on a case of beer crossing into Canada?
google ontario beer store and u can get a good idea. I think duty on a case of beer is 8.00 I think we paid 36-40 bucks a case for beer last year.
Joeman is right around 40 $ u.s. A case. But you should be able to cross with 1 case per person. I do it every year and no problems
